abstract: The move by the social network comes a week after Google introduced its own social network, which also includes a video chat feature.
snippet: The move by the social network comes a week after Google introduced its own social network, which also includes a video chat feature.
lead_paragraph: PALO ALTO, Calif. — Hoping to give its users a more intimate way to stay in touch, Facebook on Wednesday introduced video chatting inside its online social network through a deal with Skype, the Internet calling service.

headline.main: Facebook Offers Video Chat in Arrangement With Skype
headline.print_headline: Facebook Offers Video Chat In Arrangement With Skype
